description:
Few things are as down to earth as the classic baseball cap, pair this one with your favourite flannel and jeans, and you’re good to go.

  • Soft cotton construction wears well and is easy to clean
  • Deep fit works well for thick hair and big noggins
  • Faux leather patch up front
  • Snapback closure fits most
  • Original art by Revelstoke artist Emily Beaudoin
name: Ambler Lardeau Hat - Unisex
